entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:17 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -31.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 10:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -31.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -35.1°C
Wind: NNE 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
